title: [NEW] Having issues Patching 5.23? Click Here!
body:
Hey everyone,

Long holiday weekend means one thing, tons of League.  Since there will be plenty of time to catch up on some penta-kills, we want to make sure you have no problems getting League fully patched up.  Make sure to follow the steps below if you encounter any issues!

-----------------------------------------

> #***Temporarily Uninstall Ad-Aware Anti-virus/Firewall***

We've received many different reports that Ad-Aware is currently blocking League of Legends from starting and opening correctly.  Make sure to temporarily uninstall this piece of software to launch League of Legends correctly, or consider switching to a different Anti-virus/Firewall.

To help us get this problem eliminated, [make sure to reach out to Ad-Aware directly](http://www.lavasoft.com/support/supportcenter/) and let them know about the issue!

> #***Files Scanned reaches over 9000!!!!! Or, 15k, 20k, etc***

The patcher needs to scan already installed files to make sure that none of the files are corrupt.  If it finds one, it replaces it and rescans the files.  This is why it can sometimes get as high as 20k, even though there aren't 20k files in the installation.  

**The best thing to do is let it scan files!**  If you restart the client, it may cause it to scan even more files.   The patcher will eventually stop scanning files, and it will patch normally afterward.

> #***Patcher never pops up, or disappears after you press "LAUNCH"***

This can be caused by corruption with the patcher itself or it failed to properly self-patch. Additionally, it may be due to some issues with the configuration of your computer system's permissions (meaning it can't properly save the files in the correct location). To resolve this, make sure to complete all the steps in our [Patching Issues Article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)!


> #***Patcher stops/errors out at 33%, Patcher fails at 99%, or a general "Unspecified Error has occurred" message***

These are usually connection related errors. Either your computer is unable to maintain a stable connection, or a 3rd party security program is blocking League of Legends from properly patching. Many of the most common Anti-virus programs [have already whitelisted LoL](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3), however make sure to update yours to the latest version!

Also, even though you may have set specific exceptions in place before for your security program, League of Legends has gone through a major update. Therefore, your security program may recognize the old version of League of Legends, but not the new version. 

To get these issues resolved ASAP, make sure to go through our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)!

--------------------------------------------------------------

*If after completing these steps, and you still do not see the glorious orange 'LAUNCH' button, feel free to drop us a post in this thread!  Rioters as well as Wrenchmen volunteers will be on hand to respond and provide some additional help!*

replies.body: The patcher wont open once I click the icon. I have tried everything on the webpage to try and fix it.

I have been seeing a large number of reports about this compared to previous patches.  To dig a little deeper, what anti-virus or Firewall do you have installed on your computer? Or do you not have one?

If you do, you may want to consider TEMPORARILY disabling or uninstalling it, see if you can patch correctly, then re-enable it.  By doing so, you could identify the anti-virus/firewall as the root cause.

Let me know!
Tried, didn't work :/ And Avira btw

If you have tried all of those steps and are still coming up empty, the best step you can take right now is to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our Tech Specialists can work with you one-on-one in order to investigate further and get this resolved.  If you do submit a ticket, make sure to include the following:

1) [Network Analysis](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1)

2) [Network Information Log](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4)

3) [Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)

I've finally got it to work but now I have a new problem.

So far i've tried patching like ... 12 times now? Every time it downloads a bit more then the updating goes down to 0kbps (starts high and then just gets slower and slower until it stops completely and i have to restart the launcher) This keeps happening over and over. Wtf is going on? It just refuses to work.

It's taken about 4 hours to get from 33% to 41% .....

Alright, I found the bug, if nothing else worked so far do this.

GO to "Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_patcher\releases\0.0.0.[number doesnt matter]" there is a file named "**S_OK**" copy that
and then go to "Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\0.0.1.[number doesnt matter]" paste is. 

Open your client and ta-taaa, update working.

There is no folder named lol air client
Yeah I've tried literally everything that has been suggested...still won't work. RIP

okay, i was able to install, but I've been trying to help my friend install his for hours now, we've done all the deleting, restarting, rebooting, redownloading, reinstalling and nothing works
the first time, after he clicked the icon, the logo appeared and then its said something about Kernel not working
ended it on task manger and tried to open again, but the logo would just disappear
This would happen for every 'solution' we came upon and its getting kinda frustrating since the farthest we got was seeing that thin little bar load before it disappears completely. Checking task manager, it says its 'running' though the patcher never comes up
please D:
this happened to me personally a few patches ago, and I was able to fix mine via reinstalling, now, idk what to do, neither does he ;-;

You mentioned that he got a Kernel error when trying to install.  This error almost always indicates some type of issue with your OS Permissions.  While the program is trying to run, something on your OS is stopping it from doing so.  At this point, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Permissions Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions).  The steps there, while simple, are the most common solutions to this type of issue.

Let me know if you are still experiencing any issues!

> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EE0tnXs5,comment-id=00270000,timestamp=2015-11-25T21:02:27.274+0000)
>
> You mentioned that he got a Kernel error when trying to install.  This error almost always indicates some type of issue with your OS Permissions.  While the program is trying to run, something on your OS is stopping it from doing so.  At this point, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [Permissions Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions).  The steps there, while simple, are the most common solutions to this type of issue.
> 
> Let me know if you are still experiencing any issues!

HI! okay so uhm
that didnt work either
So we tried to patch it through safe mode, it patched, but it didnt go through once we were out
and Ive been reading through this thread and too many people are having an issue, have u tried checking your end? maybe something wrong with the patch itself going through people, because I patched earlier than my friend, and prob most people on this thread patched a little later in the day, maybe its cuz of that?
and Im not sure sending a ticket would help if the problem can be solve generally since many people are having the same exact predicament.

I completely understand where you are coming from.  While it may seem like a lot of people are having issues in this thread, compared to the dozens of millions of players who have patched without problem, the issue is more than likely local.  Additionally, many of the problems in this thread seem to relate to people who have Ad-Aware installed, which is a 3rd party program we have no control over (we are reaching out to them to see if they can get a fix out though).

Since the patcher seemed to have worked when you entered Safe Mode, then there definitely seems to be a setting local on your machine that is preventing you from patching normally.  If you don't have Ad-Aware installed, and you have tried all of the steps so far, I think we need to dig a little deeper into individual logs to figure out the culprit.  The best way for us to do that is if you [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can work with you one-on-one in order to get this resolved.  If you do submit a ticket, make sure to include the following info:

1) [Network Analysis](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1)

2) [Network Information Log](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4)

3) [Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)

Ha. Is it really dozens of millions? That's pretty specific (as far as "millions" references go), and quite impressive at the same time.

Seriously though, I have the feels for that other guy - I just submitted my ticket, but it super depressing seeing everyone else finding an easy solution to their issue (looking at you, Ad-Aware), while us poor souls on Mac can see the promised land from safe mode, but when trying in normal mode the dream evaporates like your hope when that {{champion:25}} Q lands...

Quick update for Mac users having this issue (of the patcher not working) — booting in safe mode seems to do the trick (to get the patcher working at least). 

_<To boot into safe mode, restart, and hold down SHIFT as soon as you hear the boot sound.>_

I'm busy downloading the patch now, hopefully the game itself will work once the patch is installed (because playing in safe mode will be all but impossible.)
Did anyone ever figure this out? I was able to get it to download it in my mac's safe mode as well, but once I reboot it still wont open :/

Edit:Unfortunately it would not work out of safe mode for macs but it did work in safe mode. No idea why. Rito, c'mon. Fix it would ya?

I've tried everything listed on the article here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues
and still can't patch the game, "unspecified error ocured" and can't do anything. For over 2 years it worked perfectly and suddendly in this patch something failed. I honestly don't know what else I can do make the game work.
The Same here, Ive tried mostly everything from that link posted, and I still come up with an "Error see Logs" prompt, stopping me at 33%. . . . . . Not sure what to do after that.....

I've been dealing with this issue for 4 hours now and I'm ready to smash my computer. Earlier, the first second I launched League, my PC froze. I restarted it and this issue came, I've restarted my PC countless times, re-downloaded almost all League files, and done everything that I've seen so far. I don't have issues with connection, haven't updated anything with my computer, I don't have any anti-virus or firewalls on my computer at all. 
Patcher stops/errors out at 33%, Patcher fails at 99%, an alert comes up saying "Unspecificed error, please check logs," or it sits there at 33% with 0 files scanned.

My patcher wont open. All I see is the logo showing up and then nothing happens but when i check task manager it shows that league is open.
Tried:
Did everything on the riot support site on patcher not opening
Temporarily disabling antivirus/firewall
Reinstalling
Uninstalled Pando Media Booster
Waiting
Run as administrator/change compatibility to windows 7
Deleting S_Ok and Releasemanifest
Deleting Folder 0.0.1.4
Deleting Folder lol_launcher/ lol_patcher
Deleting everything in Downloads
Troubleshooting / Scanning files with antivirus in Riot Games' folder
Any Tips?
P.S. I cant seem to find my network analysis/network information log/process list maybe because i disabled plugins or cookies if so please show me how to enable them
Thanks

Same, this problem has been around since tuesday :(

This happened to many of us on the same day, which was when patch 5.23 came out. IF you have tried all the basic solutions AND the suggested ones, and if it still hasnt worked, then its just the patcher problem itself for some people. Which means that Rito will have to fix the problem because what ever we do now wont really help or most likely not. All we had to do was try to run as admin, and disable anti virus or uninstall it and turn off firewall. If none of that worked, then there isnt much we can do :[
We will just have to depend on Rito and hope they find the solution for us all.

Hey there. So I have been unable to open up my League client AT ALL. I can't even get to the Launch button; I click the desktop icon, the logo shows up, and nothing happens. A vast majority of these solutions have been unsuccessful. My computer will not open the firewall, the lol_launcher and lol_patcher tricks didn't work, the online Riot-created connection threads were a no-go and even a factory reset/re-installation of the game did not work. It was working just perfectly fine before the bug in the game's shop on Tuesday. Any help?

I'm having a similar issue to everyone else where i clicked on my desktop icon for league of legends and the league of legends logo will appear for a split second then dissapear. it does show up in my task manager processes. the lolpatcher.exe process will keep taking up more and more memory as it goes on before i end it and retry again. I've reinstalled league a few times now but get the same result, i have also followed all of the guides in the patching issues article and it has not change a thing. i have no clue what else i am supposed to do.

Do you happen to have Ad-Aware installed at all?  Many of the symptoms you are describing are very similar to the issues that Ad-Aware users are experiencing.  If you do have it installed, make sure to try disabling it or temporarily uninstalling it to see if it resolves your issue.

If you are still experiencing issues, don't hesitate to reply back!

My patcher simply won't open when I click on it. I've tried opening it in admin mode but it just won't open. I opened my task manager and it tells me it's opened but I can't see it. I have reset winsock, changed my resolution and everything but it just won't work. I reinstalled it twice and it doesn't work. I hope I can get some help from someone. Thank you.

I've done everything I found online.
Same with me. Try rebooting in safe mode and it'll appear. Not sure what the underlying issue is as to why it won't launch when I start el capitan normally.

unspecified error. check the logs for more... :///// whyyyy !?

I'm having issues with Mac. I run League of Legends and tried even other tutorials which you take the userkernel and replace it but that still did not fix the issue. In my activity monitor it shows (UserKernel) not responding. 

What the ultimate problem is, is that when I double click on the league of legends icon to run the game, I see lolpatcherux bobbing up and down, but it never actually goes to the launcher window to click on "launch".

I've been having this issue about 2 weeks now. I was on patch 5.22 before this happened. I was able to run league through safe mode, but the fps would be really choppy if I were to actually play. 

I uninstalled and reinstalled in safe mode reboot, but once out of safemode, I can't do much else.

This is becoming absolutely ridiculous. The past few days ANY game I am in, I constatly get high ping- 500 to 2000. I'm constantly disconnecting. I have never had this happen to me except these past few days. Please, tell me how to fix this!

Since the same issues are happening again with the updated 5.23 patch I think its pretty safe to assume this is an issue created by the patch and not something the individual has done. Riot should really focus its attention on the patch and FIXING IT, not blaming the community for it not working. Honestly, it took 4 days for me to figure out a way to get the patch to install properly (ive never had an issue patching before) and now, after 1 full day of playing, I have to figure out another way because your patch update has the same issue.


What the actual F*ck Rito?

Can we have more than 1 lame rep focus their efforts on this problem? 

"send a ticket" is not a fix. Your customer service is more frustrating than it is helpful

I tried everything to open my league launcher and I checked the rads_user_kernel and it said RADS::API::Impl::Main::Main: Could not determine solution or project runtime environment, execution will continue but all files will be treated as unmanaged in the current folder. What do I do?

Just tried to patch and it was sitting on 99% applying patch for 2 hours. So I closed the client and restarted then got stuck scanning files at 33% for 3 hours (over 25k). Why is this specific patch so troublesome?

Please help...... D:
I have tried about EVERY suggested solutions on how to fix my launcher on the help and support and from other suggestions. I have also tried the ones from the issues article. I have tried renewing my ip. disabling ipv6, and have tried restarting my pc. also, some people have said to change my region from NA to EU. i have to open the launcher.cfg file but how do i do that!?!?!? it wont let me open that file to rename anything. PLEASE please help. It has been 4 DAYS in my Thanks giving Break trying to fix this problem. All 4 days in my precious break, DOWN THE DRAIN.
Im gonna assume that the lol_air_client doesnt exist for some people here? and those people who dont, have they reinstalled league ever since patch day?

So after i try patching it gives me the "Unspecified Error has occurred" message, and this is after 15k files have been scanned. So far I have tried restarting the client, my computer, all the solutions on the Connection Issues Guide and tried disabling security and running as an admin. At this point i have no idea what to do. Any help would be appreciated.{{item:3070}}
